overview: Collection of three short films from Falcon Studios. "I Want More" — Insatiable Donny has legendary Bert Edwards and Big Rod at the same time. Hot double duty action. They use him up, wear him out, and he loves it. "Fraternity Brothers" — Ted and Bill exchange looks in the frathouse... The danger of getting caught heightens their excitement... They gamble... It pays off... Experiencing new sensations and pleasures only elevates their friendship. "Manhole" (a.k.a. "Bert") — One of Bert Edwards best performances ever... Fast paced... Something for everyone... The hottest totally dominating sex-a-thon ever.
title: I Want More
